title: "Data Visulization: Flights on ABIA"
author: Richard Marks
date: 2/10/2020
output: pdf_document
---
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(mosaic,)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```
```{r}
load("~/.Rdata")
Total_Flight_Delays = (ABIA %>% group_by(UniqueCarrier) %>% summarize(Carrier_Delay = mean(CarrierDelay + WeatherDelay + NASDelay + SecurityDelay + LateAircraftDelay, na.rm = TRUE)))
ggplot(data = Total_Flight_Delays) + geom_bar(mapping = aes(x= reorder(UniqueCarrier, Carrier_Delay), y=Carrier_Delay), stat = 'identity') + coord_flip() + labs(x="Airline (Code)", y= "Average Delay Time (Minutes)", title = "Which Airlines Have the Longest Average Delays")
```
